EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.1997.Cloud wise.Email 5 - Data center services WIP video & whi
EmailTemplate.subject: Accelerate your data center deployment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Nokia Data Center Services Telco cloud services
The journey towards a true telco cloud Discover why 62% of operators believe it is essential to select a data center partner with deep knowledge and true expertise in telco operations. Download white paper <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200474]]> ► Data centers are the heart of every cloud. But telecom operators have a significantly harder task than enterprises when it comes to creating and deploying them. That’s why 62 percent of operators believe it is essential to select a data center partner with deep knowledge and true expertise in telco operations.
Nokia provides this expertise. This exclusive white paper, The journey towards a true telco cloud, explains how Nokia Data Center Services can get your data center online quickly and help you smoothly transition to a cloud infrastructure designed to meet your strategic objectives.
- The benefits of cloud transformation - Telco-specific challenges - How to realize the dream of a telco cloud
Nokia Data Center Services Nokia Data Center Services can help you create, manage and maintain a custom-made, multivendor cloud infrastructure that is agile and cost effective. Watch the video <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200499]]> ► © 2016 Nokia.
